name: Shopping Center Tycoon
description:
Wishlist&Follow Shopping Center Tycoon!



Would you like to build and manage the shopping center of your dreams?

It has never been easier for you to start small and work your way to the top. You can build your own dream shopping center and fulfill the needs of your customers while selling a variety of different products in a shopping center that you and your customers will admire. Lay the foundations of your shopping center and make your dream come true.

Features :


* 11 Different Stand Categories.
* 19 Pieces Decoration.
* 7 Different Floor Decorations.
* 110 Different Items For Sale.
* 15 Unlockable Product And Customer Enhancements.
* Upgrades To Increase The Price Of All Products.

Gameplay :


Build your dream shopping center in your game, decorate your shopping center, classify and place your stands as you wish. Whether you want to sell only one type of product or benefit from all products, you can have the shopping center of your dreams.
